Package it.polimi.ingsw.events.servertoclient

Interface EventToClientNotifier

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConnectionToClient
public interface EventToClientNotifier
This interface contains the list of methods that the server could use to send different events to the client.
Author:
Stefano Fossati

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void sendArrayLeaderCards​(java.util.ArrayList<LeaderCard> leaderCards, boolean initialLeaderCards, Player currentPlayer, boolean isFinal)
    Sends to the client/player the information of the leader cards.
    void sendDevelopmentCardSpace​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> developmentCardSpace)
    Sends the request to select the development card space in which the player want to position the development card bought.
    void sendEndGame​(java.lang.String message, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> playersPoint, Player[] players, FaithTrack faithTrack, boolean lorenzo, int lorenzoPosition, DevelopmentCard[][] devCard, Market market)
    Sends the notify that the game ended to the client.
    void sendInitialResources​(int numResources, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> depositState)
    Sends to the client/player the request to choose the initial resource of the match set up.
    void sendLorenzoTurn​(SoloAction lorenzoAction, int lorenzoPosition)
    Sends the action that Lorenzo done in the single player match to the client.
    void sendNamePlayerRequest​(java.lang.String message)
    Sends the request to choose the own nickname for the match to the client.
    void sendNewTurn​(int turnNumber, Market market, DevelopmentCard[][] developmentCards, Player[] players, FaithTrack faithTrack, boolean yourTurn)
    Sends all the needed information to the client.
    void sendNotify​(java.lang.String message)
    Sends a notify to the client.
    void sendNumPlayerRequest​(java.lang.String message)
    Sends the request to choose the number of player for the match.
    void sendPing()
    Sends a ping to the client.
    void sendReorganizeDeposit​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> marketResources, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> depositState, boolean isAdditional, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> additionalType, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> additionalState)
    Sends the request to reorganize the deposit to the client.
    void sendRoomRequestToClient​(java.lang.String message)
    Sends the request to choose the room to the client.
    void sendTurnReselection​(java.lang.String message)
    Sends the reselection of the turn to the client.

  • Method Details

    • sendRoomRequestToClient

      void sendRoomRequestToClient​(java.lang.String message)
      Sends the request to choose the room to the client.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to sent to the client.

    • sendNamePlayerRequest

      void sendNamePlayerRequest​(java.lang.String message)
      Sends the request to choose the own nickname for the match to the client.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to send to the client. It contains some instructions.

    • sendNumPlayerRequest

      void sendNumPlayerRequest​(java.lang.String message)
      Sends the request to choose the number of player for the match. Only the first player that access to the room could choose the number of player.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to send to the client.

    • sendInitialResources

      void sendInitialResources​(int numResources, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> depositState)
      Sends to the client/player the request to choose the initial resource of the match set up.
      Parameters:
      numResources - The number of resources that the player have to choose.
      depositState - The initial deposit state of the player.

    • sendArrayLeaderCards

      void sendArrayLeaderCards​(java.util.ArrayList<LeaderCard> leaderCards, boolean initialLeaderCards, Player currentPlayer, boolean isFinal)
      Sends to the client/player the information of the leader cards.
      Parameters:
      leaderCards - The leader cards of the player.
      initialLeaderCards - Indicates the phase of the match in which the leader card are send. If is true the leader cards are to choose for the set up of the match. If is false the leader cards are to manage like in a normal turn.
      currentPlayer - The player send his own leader cards to.
      isFinal -

    • sendNewTurn

      void sendNewTurn​(int turnNumber, Market market, DevelopmentCard[][] developmentCards, Player[] players, FaithTrack faithTrack, boolean yourTurn)
      Sends all the needed information to the client.
      Parameters:
      turnNumber - The number of the turn.
      market - The structure of the market.
      developmentCards - The structure of the development cards on the table with its information.
      players - The players with their public information.
      faithTrack - The state of the faith track.
      yourTurn - Indicates if the next turn is of the player to which is sent this event. If is true the next turn is of the client to which is sent this event. If is false the next turn is of another client.

    • sendReorganizeDeposit

      void sendReorganizeDeposit​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> marketResources, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> depositState, boolean isAdditional, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> additionalType, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> additionalState)
      Sends the request to reorganize the deposit to the client.
      Parameters:
      marketResources - The resources take from the market.
      depositState - The deposit state of the player that have to reorganize the deposit.
      isAdditional - Indicates if there is or there are additional deposits send.
      additionalType - The type of the additional deposits send.
      additionalState - The state of the additional deposits send.

    • sendTurnReselection

      void sendTurnReselection​(java.lang.String message)
      Sends the reselection of the turn to the client.
      Parameters:
      message - The information for which this event is send.

    • sendDevelopmentCardSpace

      void sendDevelopmentCardSpace​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> developmentCardSpace)
      Sends the request to select the development card space in which the player want to position the development card bought.
      Parameters:
      developmentCardSpace - The state of the development card space of the player.

    • sendNotify

      void sendNotify​(java.lang.String message)
      Sends a notify to the client.
      Parameters:
      message - The information of the notify.

    • sendEndGame

      void sendEndGame​(java.lang.String message, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> playersPoint, Player[] players, FaithTrack faithTrack, boolean lorenzo, int lorenzoPosition, DevelopmentCard[][] devCard, Market market)
      Sends the notify that the game ended to the client.
      Parameters:
      message - The massage to send to the client.
      playersPoint - The points of all players.
      faithTrack - The faith track of the match.
      lorenzo - Indicates if is a single player match.
      lorenzoPosition - Lorenzo position if is a single player match.
      market - The market of the match.

    • sendLorenzoTurn

      void sendLorenzoTurn​(SoloAction lorenzoAction, int lorenzoPosition)
      Sends the action that Lorenzo done in the single player match to the client.
      Parameters:
      lorenzoAction - The type of action done by Lorenzo.
      lorenzoPosition - The position of lorenzo in the faith track.

    • sendPing

      void sendPing()
      Sends a ping to the client.
